Class Processor

  • java.lang.Object
    • components.Processor

  • public class Processor
extends java.lang.Object
    Main processor class. Holds many variables and not much more.
    Honestly don't really need it.. but hey why not?
    Author:
    David

    • Constructor Detail

      • Processor

        public Processor(java.util.Queue<Instruction> instructionQ_0,
                 java.util.Queue<Instruction> instructionQ_1,
                 int addUnitNumber,
                 int addUnitDelay,
                 int multUnitNumber,
                 int multUnitDelay,
                 int storeBufferNumber,
                 int loadBufferNumber,
                 int addReservationStationNumber,
                 int multReservationStationNumber,
                 int memDelay)
        Constructor for processor class
        Parameters:
        instructionQ_0 - Instructions for first thread
        instructionQ_1 - Instructions for second thread
        addUnitNumber - Number of ADD/SUB units
        addUnitDelay - ADD/SUB unit calculation time in CC's
        multUnitNumber - Number of MULT/DIV units
        multUnitDelay - MULT/DIV unit calculation time in CC's
        storeBufferNumber - Number of store buffers
        loadBufferNumber - Number of load buffers
        addReservationStationNumber - Number of reservation stations for ADD/SUB units
        multReservationStationNumber - Number of reservation stations for MULT/DIV units
        memDelay - The amount of CC's it takes to do a memory action (LOAD/STORE)
